projects.name: tree-sitter
projects.describe: Tree-sitter is a parser generator tool and an incremental parsing library. It can build a concrete syntax tree for a source file and efficiently update the syntax tree as the source file is edited.

projects.name: libmagic
projects.describe: Determines mime type of a file and get the charset of a text file. Cannot detect various flavors of extended ASCII, that will returns unknown result, for many uses this is good enough.
